title: Too Much To Read Into?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and David Jacoby debate what the clauses about film study in Kyler Murray's new contract tell you about him and how much stock they are putting in Bill Belichick’s comments that Mac Jones has made “dramatic improvement” this offseason.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): What Do The Details Of Kyler Murray's Contract Tell Us?
